{{Actor| | type = SFX | name = Decal | class = Decal | doomednum = 9200 }}[[Classes]]: Decal
The '''Decal''' is a useful tool to add graphics to walls without requiring a custom texture. See [[Decals]] for more information on importing custom images as decals. A decal takes one argument, which is the ID defined in the [[DECALDEF]] lump. The angle must be set to face away from the wall and the Z-height must be set appropriately for the intended use. If the decal ID is greater than 255, and the map is in the [[Hexen format]] which does not permit arg values greater than that, the second argument can be used for the high byte. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR Decal native {}
